subject: Self Care
title: EQ at Work
description: A fast breakdown of EQ at Work for builders.

hook.text: The most promoted employee wasn't the most skilled. She was the one everyone wanted on their team.

buildup.text: Studies show 90% of top performers score high in emotional intelligence regardless of their technical skills.

discovery.text: EQ at work means reading the room, managing up, handling criticism, and navigating office dynamics skillfully.

twist.text: Technical brilliance with low EQ creates friction. People skills are not optional â€” they're career infrastructure.

climax.text: Invest in EQ like a job skill. Practice listening, giving feedback, and reading unspoken dynamics daily at work.

punchline.text: EQ is the career skill nobody teaches but everyone rewards.

quiz.question: What percentage of top performers score high in emotional intelligence?
